title: The answer to Tom-Tell-Troth the practise of princes and the lamentations of the kirke / written by the Lord Baltismore, late secretary of state.
author: Baltimore, George Calvert, Baron, 1580?-1632.
notes: "Tom-Tell-Troth, or a free discourse", originally published about 1626 (STC 23868), was reprinted in 1642; Lord Baltimore's answer, written for Charles I early in his reign, had not previously been published.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
